<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Razzle-Dazzle](/Feats.aspx?ID=4429) <actions string="Free Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Gnome" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=80" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 52 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Frequency**
once per hour

**Trigger**
You blind or dazzle a creature

</column>

---

You've spent considerable time practicing the manipulation of light, weaponizing your blade's reflection or bolstering the luminosity of magical displays to unconventional heights. Extend the duration of the [blinded](/Conditions.aspx?ID=1) or [dazzled](/Conditions.aspx?ID=7) condition you give the target by 1 round.
name: Razzle-Dazzle
